languages.text: "Почтем за великую честь, Ваша Светлость! Только, если позволите просьбу: не говорите Мастеру дисциплины, что мы с вами омовения совершали. Госпожа Зауэрбэк с нас три шкуры спустит".
languages.translation_comment:
блюститель ж
Зауэрбек хорошо бы добавить потом опцию наябедничать

блюститель ж
Зауэрбек хорошо бы добавить потом опцию наябедничать

languages.text: "We would consider it a great honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But please do not tell the Master-at-Arms we joined in your ablutions. Mistress Sauerback will beat us bloody if she finds out."
languages.original_text: "Почтем за великую честь, Ваша Светлость! Только, если позволите просьбу: не говорите Мастеру дисциплины, что мы с вами омовения совершали. Госпожа Зауэрбэк с нас три шкуры спустит".

traits.locale_text: "We will consider it a great honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We would just beg for one thing: please don't tell the Master of Discipline that we joined you in your ablutions. Else Mistress Sauerback will tan our hides for it."
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

traits.locale_text: "We will consider it a great honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We would just beg for one thing: please don't tell the Master of Discipline that we joined you in your ablutions. Else Mistress Sauerback will tan our hides for it."

traits.locale_text: "We would consider it a great honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But please do not tell the Master-at-Arms we joined in your ablutions. Mistress Sauerback will beat us bloody if she finds out."
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: « C'est un grand honneur que vous nous faites, Votre Seigneurie, mais je vous prie de ne pas dire à la capitaine d'armes que nous nous sommes joints à vos ablutions. Madame Sauerback nous battra si elle l'apprend. »
languages.original_text: "We would consider it a great honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But please do not tell the Master-at-Arms we joined in your ablutions. Mistress Sauerback will beat us bloody if she finds out."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un grand honneur que vous nous faites, Votre Seigneurie, mais je vous prie de ne pas dire à la capitaine d'armes que nous nous sommes joints à vos ablutions. Madame Sauerback nous battra si elle l'apprend. »
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: «¡Lo consideraríamos un gran honor, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Pero le pido que no le cuente a la maestra de armas que nos hemos unido a sus abluciones. La señora Sauerback nos dará una paliza de muerte si se entera».
languages.original_text: "We would consider it a great honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But please do not tell the Master-at-Arms we joined in your ablutions. Mistress Sauerback will beat us bloody if she finds out."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lo consideraríamos un gran honor, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Pero le pido que no le cuente a la maestra de armas que nos hemos unido a sus abluciones. La señora Sauerback nos dará una paliza de muerte si se entera».
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: “这是我们莫大的荣幸，大人！不过，求您千万不要告诉戒律大师，说您允许我们与您一起沐浴。要是苏尔贝克女士发现了这件事情，她一定会把我们揍得皮开肉绽。”
languages.original_text: "We would consider it a great honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But please do not tell the Master-at-Arms we joined in your ablutions. Mistress Sauerback will beat us bloody if she finds out."

traits.locale_text: “这是我们莫大的荣幸，大人！不过，求您千万不要告诉戒律大师，说您允许我们与您一起沐浴。要是苏尔贝克女士发现了这件事情，她一定会把我们揍得皮开肉绽。”
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: 「素晴らしいお話です、陛下！ですが、あなたの朝浴に参加したことは、マスター・アット・アームズには言わないでください。ザウアーバック女王様に見つかったら、血まみれになるまで殴られてしまいます」
languages.original_text: "We would consider it a great honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But please do not tell the Master-at-Arms we joined in your ablutions. Mistress Sauerback will beat us bloody if she finds out."

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしいお話です、陛下！ですが、あなたの朝浴に参加したことは、マスター・アット・アームズには言わないでください。ザウアーバック女王様に見つかったら、血まみれになるまで殴られてしまいます」
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: "Es wäre uns eine große Ehre, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Aber bitte sagt der Master-at-Arms nicht, dass wir an Euren Waschungen teilgenommen haben. Herrin Sauerback würde uns blutig prügeln, wenn sie es herausfindet."
languages.original_text: "We would consider it a great honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But please do not tell the Master-at-Arms we joined in your ablutions. Mistress Sauerback will beat us bloody if she finds out."

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre uns eine große Ehre, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Aber bitte sagt der Master-at-Arms nicht, dass wir an Euren Waschungen teilgenommen haben. Herrin Sauerback würde uns blutig prügeln, wenn sie es herausfindet."
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: "Bu bizim için büyük bir onur olur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Fakat taharet ayini esnasında size katıldığımızı lütfen Silahtar'a söylemeyin. Üstat Sauerback bunu öğrenirse bizi groks sudan gelene kadar döver."
languages.original_text: "We would consider it a great honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But please do not tell the Master-at-Arms we joined in your ablutions. Mistress Sauerback will beat us bloody if she finds out."
